title: BeCommunity
description: Application designed to provide users with the opportunity to join or create communities based on a wide range of topics. The platform is built to foster a sense of belonging, promote collaboration, and provide an inclusive space for individuals to connect with others who share similar interests and passions.
tech-stack: Build using Python, Django, JavaScript, ReactJs, Postgresql

title: ShareBox
description: A simple marketplace for small content creators and writers to sell their creations and earn from them and also provide a platform for people to find good reads and content at a reasonable price.
tech-stack: Build using Python, Django, JavaScript, ReactJs, Postgresql, Stripe

title: ChatApp
description: A real time React.js and Django based website that lets you chat with your friends
tech-stack: Build using Python, Django, DjangoRestFramework, Channels & WebSockets, JavaScript, React.js, JWT
